>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.7gsxV0nk1qel9Xow]{Devastator}

At 15th level, you gain renewed vigor when one of your foes is brought low. When you or an ally linked by your telepathic bond class feature scores a critical hit against a foe, as a reaction you can spend 1 Resolve Point to regain a number of Stamina Points equal to three times your mystic level, plus your Wisdom modifier (up to your maximum number of Stamina Points). Once you have benefited from mystic bloodlust, you canâ€™t gain the benefits from this ability again until you rest to recover Stamina.
